<a name="convertImageToBase64"></a>

## convertImageToBase64(url) â‡’ <code>Object</code>
Converts an image's content to Data URI scheme.

**Returns**: <code>Object</code> - A promise that when resolved, returns the Base64 string.  

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| url | <code>String</code> | The path of the image to be converted. |

**Example**  
```js
convertImageToBase64('images/index.png').then(function (string64) {
  return string64;
});
// => data:image/png;base64,
```
